column3: ハッ！　何とかうまくいきましたね
column4: Ha! Somehow, it went well, didn't it?

column3: ボードクエストやら依頼やら、ぬかり無く見ときましょう
column4: Let's look at all the board quests and requests.

column3: 一筋縄じゃあ、いかなさそうな場所ですね
column4: It's not an easy place to get around.

column3: 上出来だったと思いますがね
column4: I think it went well, but...

column3: 今行きますぜ！
column4: I'm on my way!

column3: 何が来たってお守りします！
column4: We will protect you no matter what comes your way!

column3: 何というかこう、雰囲気が変わりましたね
column4: The atmosphere has changed.

column3: 俺がついてます！
column4: I'm with you!

column3: 俺の力、きっとお役に立ちますぜ
column4: My power will surely be of use to you.

column3: 俺の揺さぶりに耐えられるかぁ？！
column4: Can you withstand my shaking?!

column3: 先ほどエリア探索から戻りました
column4: I just returned from exploring the area.

column3:
先日、別の覚者様に呼ばれて
ちょっくら冒険のお供をしてきましたぜ
column4:
The other day, I was invited by another Arisen
person to accompany him on a little adventure!

column3: 外れたな
column4: Missed.

column3: 寝ずの番は俺にお任せを――
column4: Leave the night watch to me.

column3: 属性を付与！　これで攻撃してみてください！
column4: Improved attributes! Please try attacking now!

column3: 弱点を叩くってのはな、戦いの基本だぜ！
column4:
Hitting the weak points is the basis of battle,
you know!

column3: 戦いも結構ですが、休養ってのもイイですなぁ
column4: Fighting is good, but rest is also good.

column3: 敵か？　仕方ねぇ――！
column4: Enemies? It can't be helped--

column3: 敵ですよ、やりますか？
column4: Are they the enemy? Will you fight?

column3: 来やがったな！
column4: You're here!

column3: 楽勝ってわけにゃいきませんね
column4: It's not going to be an easy win.

column3: 気合い入れてお守りしますよ！
column4: I will protect you with all my energy!

column3: 渾身の力で――喰らわすぜ――！
column4: I'll strike you with all my might!

column3: 結構な成果ですよ、こいつぁ！
column4: This is quite an achievement, I must say!

column3: 興奮してるみてぇですね！　攻撃には注意してくださいよ！
column4: It looks agitated! Be careful of the attacks!

column3: 舐めてかかると、痛い目見そうだな。ありゃ
column4:
If you underestimate me, you're in for a world of
hurt. Well then...

column3:
覚者さま、
ここらで宝でも探してみましょうや
column4:
Dear Arisen, Let's try searching for treasures
around here.

column3: 覚者さま、新しい特技、閃めきましたぜ
column4: Dear Arisen, I've got an idea for a new skill.

column3: 覚者様、今回のエリア探索は大収穫ですぜ！
column4:
Dear Arisen, this exploration of the area has
been a great success!

column3: 覚者様、今日は俺から戦技のご提案をさせてもらえませんかね！
column4:
Master, may I propose a combat technique to you
today?

column3: 覚者様、今日は俺から髪型のご提案があるんですよ！
column4:
Dear Arisen, I have a haircut suggestion for you
today!

column3: 覚者様、修練敵がいますぜ！
column4: Ser Arisen, there are training enemies!

column3:
覚者様、手に入れたこの力で、
今までよりもお力になれるはずです――
お任せくだせぇ
column4:
Arisen, with the power I have obtained, I should
be able to be of more help than before―― Please
entrust it to me.

column3:
覚者様、新しい家財を入手されたんですか！
こりゃぁいいや！
column4:
Dear Master, did you get new household goods?
That's good!

column3: 覚者様がご無事で何より！
column4:
I am glad to hear that you are safe and sound,
Arisen!

column3: 覚者様が仰るんなら
column4: If the Arisen says so

column3:
覚者様に従ってきたおかげで
俺の意思疎通力が上がったんで！
column4:
Thanks to following the Arisen My communication
skills have improved!

column3: 覚者様の邪魔してんじゃねぇぞ、おう！
column4: Don't get in the way of the Master of the Arisen!

column3: 解ったぜ！
column4: Got it!

column3: 誰か、手ぇ貸してくれ！
column4: Somebody give me a hand here!
